name: Disconnected (Double-Dev)
description:
Created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Theme: Joined Together!

You sit down at your computer to play a simple platformer game, when all of a sudden your wifi starts acting funny and the player character is only intermittently under your control. Your controls have been hacked by someone determined to troll you and prevent you from beating the game! Can you win while this person's controls are joined to your own?

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Esc to pause. R to restart on death.

Note: This game was created in a custom C++ game engine that is under heavy development.

Programming: Dorian Cauwe & Deven Layton

Art: Ava Layton

Music by Zen Man on Pixabay.
